pageTitle: DR D.Y.PATIL MEDICAL COLLEGE ,PUNE ADMISSION 2014 | MBBS- info
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {55195=Padmashree Dr. D. Y. Patil Medical College, Hospital and Research Centre established in 1996, received recognition of the Medical Council of India (MCI), for the award of MBBS degree from its very first batch. The Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth comprising of Padmashree Dr. D.Y. Patil Medical College, Hospital & Research Centre, has been accorded the status of University under section 3 of the UGC Act, 1956, vide Notification No. F. 9-39/2001-U.3 dated 11th Jan. 2003 of the Government of India., 54690=In 2003, the college was permitted to teach post-graduate courses in a couple of subjects. In June 2005, the college was allowed an intake of 81 students in post graduate degree and diploma courses and presently there are 123 PG-students in the following 19 subjects : General Surgery, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Orthopaedics, Opthalmology, Ent (Oto Rhino Laryngology), General Medicine, Paediatrics, Anaesthesiology, Psychiatry, Radio-diagnosis, Tb & Chest Diseases, Skin & Venereal Diseases, Pathology, Community Medicine, Pharmacology, Microbiology, Anatomy, Physiology and Biochemistry. The college has also been permitted to conduct super speciality courses in Neurosurgery, Urology and Nephrology., 56330=ALL INDIA PG ENTRANCE EXAM FOR  DR D.Y. PATIL VIDYAPEETH ,PUNE(DEEMED UNIVERSITY) 2014}
textBeforeTable: Annual Fees   Fee Structure   We are confident that Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth, Pune will continue to spread the light of education and vision and contribute to the eradication of ignorance in the years to come. DPU welcomes all those willing to widen their horizons and enhance themselves Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth, Pune, we take each word in this saying literally. And that is why DPU has carved a niche in the education field not just in Maharashtra and India but across the world. However, we also believe that there is always room for progress and betterment. Just as we have grown in leaps and bounds in the last nine years, moving swiftly from one to eight institutes under the aegis of the Deemed University, we believe we have miles still to go.   Welcome to Dr. D.
